themes: lack of support for open-ended projects
key_phrases: more opportunities that cover projects that don't have a goal
developing a project to meet a handful of requirements...is constricting to art
artists should have the freedom to let their intuition guide the project
not necessarily mandates on what the project should be about
solutions_proposed: offer opportunities for projects without predetermined goals
reduce or remove mandates on project topics
allow artists more freedom and intuition in project development
